bibl.title: Untersuchungen zu den Frauenkatalogen Hesiods.
bibl.seg: DRÄGER Paul, Untersuchungen zu den Frauenkatalogen Hesiods. (Palingenesia. 61.)
Stuttgart, Fr. Steiner, 1997, 8°, 171 pp. ISBN 3-515-07028-1. DM 68.

C.R. par Daniel Donnet, AntCl 67 (1998) pp. 308-309. - Serena Ferrando, Maia N.S., 50 (1998) pp. 546-547. - N.J. Richardson, CR N.S., 50 (2000) pp. 263-264. - Walter Stockert, AnzAW 53 (2000) coll. 146-149.
